alert.note: Alert for Hancock (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 18 at 8:39AM CST until February 19 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Virginia...Tennessee... Clinch River Near Speers Ferry VA affecting Scott and Hancock Counties. Clinch River Above Tazewell TN affecting Grainger, Claiborne and Hancock Counties. Powell River Near Arthur TN affecting Claiborne and Union Counties. ...The Flood Warning is cancelled for the following rivers in Virginia...Tennessee... North Fork Holston River Near Gate City VA affecting Scott, Hawkins and Sullivan Counties. Sequatchie River Near Whitwell TN affecting Bledsoe, Marion and Sequatchie Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL JUST AFTER MIDNIGHT TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Clinch River near Speers Ferry VA. * WHEN...Until just after midnight tonight. * IMPACTS...At 18.0 feet, County Road 627 just downstream floods. At 21.0 feet, One or two houses are threatened. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:15 AM EST Saturday the stage was 21.7 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 9:15 AM EST Saturday was 23.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage this evening and continue falling to 6.0 feet Thursday morning. - Flood stage is 18.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this morning at 1045 AM EST /945 AM CST/.
